AppPackage.Description: The path to the Web Deploy package to deploy.

AppsLicenseFile.Description: The path to the Sitecore license file.

AppName.Description: The name of the site to be deployed.

AppsRootFolder.Description: Root folder to install the site to. If left on the default [systemdrive]:\inetpub\wwwroot will be used

XConnectCertificate.Description: The certificate to use for encryption. Provide the name or the thumbprint.

SqlServerDatabasePrefix.Description: The prefix used for all Sql databases.

SolrCorePrefix.Description: The prefix used for all Solr cores.

AppCertificate.Description: The certificate to use for HTTPS web bindings. Provide the name or the thumbprint. If not provided a certificate will be generated.

SqlServerAdminUser.Description: The Sql admin user account to use when installing databases.

SqlServerAdminPassword.Description: The Sql admin password to use when installing databases.

DatabaseCollectionUser.Description: The Sql admin user account to use when installing databases.

DatabaseCollectionPassword.Description: The Sql admin password to use when installing databases.

DatabaseProcessingPoolsUser.Description: The Sql user for the Processing Pools connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseProcessingPoolsPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Processing Pools connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseReferenceDataUser.Description: The Sql user for the Reference Data connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseReferenceDataPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Reference Data connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseMarketingAutomationUser.Description: The Sql user for the Marketing Automation connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseMarketingAutomationPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Marketing Automation connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseMessagingUser.Description: The Sql user for the Messaging connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseMessagingPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Messaging connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseProcessingEngineUser.Description: The Sql user for the Processing Engine Tasks and Storage database connection strings in Sitecore.

DatabaseProcessingEnginePassword.Description: The Sql password for the Processing Engine Tasks and Storage database connection strings in Sitecore.

DatabaseReportingUser.Description: The Sql user for the Reporting connection string in Sitecore.

DatabaseReportingPassword.Description: The Sql password for the Reporting connection string in Sitecore.

SqlServerInstance.Description: The Sql Server where databases will be installed.

AppEnvironment.Description: The configuration environment for this instance.

AppLogLevel.Description: The level of log information to output.

AppHostMappingName.Description: The host mapping name of the app.

AppDnsName.Description: The dns name of the app.

PackagesTempLocation.Description: Alternative location to save WDP packages. If left on the default $Env:Temp will be used.

PackagesDownloadLocations.Description: File with URI and SHA256 hashes of dynamically downloadable WDPs.

Update.Description: The parameter for the installing delta WDP packages.

SqlServerDeployToElasticPoolName.Description: The elastic pool name for deploy databases from the SQL Azure.

Variables.Sql.Database.ShardMapManager.Name: [concat(variable('Sql.Database.Sharding.Prefix'), 'MapManager')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Shard0.Name: [concat(variable('Sql.Database.Sharding.Prefix'), '0')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Shard1.Name: [concat(variable('Sql.Database.Sharding.Prefix'), '1')]
Variables.Sql.Database.ProcessingPools.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_Processing.Pools')]
Variables.Sql.Database.MarketingAutomation.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_MarketingAutomation')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Messaging.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_Messaging')]
Variables.Sql.Database.ReferenceData.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_ReferenceData')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Reporting.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_Reporting')]
Variables.Sql.Database.ProcessingEngineTasks.Name: [concat(parameter('SqlServerDatabasePrefix'), '_ProcessingEngineTasks')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Messaging.Alter: [concat('ALTER DATABASE [', variable('Sql.Database.Messaging.Name'), '] MODIFY ( endpoint_OBJECTIVE = ELASTIC_POOL ( name = [', parameter('SqlServerDeployToElasticPoolName'), '] ));')]
Variables.Sql.Database.Reporting.Alter: [concat('ALTER DATABASE [', variable('Sql.Database.Reporting.Name'), '] MODIFY ( endpoint_OBJECTIVE = ELASTIC_POOL ( name = [', parameter('SqlServerDeployToElasticPoolName'), '] ));')]
Variables.Sharding.Tool.Argument.Name: [if(variable('Sql.Databases.To.ElasticPool'),'/dbedition','/elasticpool')]
Variables.Solr.Core.Xdb.Name: [concat(parameter('SolrCorePrefix'), '_xdb')]
Variables.Solr.Core.XdbRebuild.Name: [concat(variable('Solr.Core.Xdb.Name'), '_rebuild')]
Variables.Services.IndexWorker.Name: [concat(parameter('AppName'), '-IndexWorker')]
Variables.Services.MarketingAutomationEngine.Name: [concat(parameter('AppName'), '-EndpointMarketingAutomation')]
Variables.Services.ProcessingEngine.Name: [concat(parameter('AppName'), '-EndpointProcessingEngine')]

DownloadWDP.Description: Download the WDP and verifies it against the stored hash.

CreatePaths.Description: Ensure the destination path for the site exists.

CreateAppPool.Description: Creates or updates the app pool.

SetAppPoolCertStorePermissions.Description: Set permissions for the App Pool User to access the client certificate.

CreateWebsite.Description: Creates or updates the IIS website instance.

StopWebsite.Description: Stops the website if it is running.

StopAppPool.Description: Stops the app pool if it is running.

EndpointStops.Description: Stops the services if they running.

CreateBindingsWithThumbprint.Description: Configures the site bindings for the webapp.

CreateHostHeader.Description: Sets a hostheader for the webapp.

SetPermissions.Description: Sets permissions for the app pool user.

InstallWDP.Description: Syncs the web deploy package with the webapp.
